jobs.description: 1. Candidates have to make outbound calls to the US to sell our products or services 2. Generate new sales or subscriptions to the different services offered 3. Excellent track records on MCA Live Transfer, and Appointment setting 6. HSC, O Level, A-Level, Bachelor degree in any discipline  7. Performance bonus, Weekly 2 holidays 8. Salary Review: First Half Yearly then Every Year 9. Festival Bonus: 2 (Yearly) 10. Attendance Bonus 11. Transportation Allowance after 6 months of employment 12. Free Dinner for Night Shift after 3 months of employment. We suggest every Applicant who are currently looking for an opportunity in International Call Center Industry can aplly, we will review the request and send it to the right Room, and your expected Employer will Contact you.
